All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Appointments
This is the Appointment class for creating the Appointment objects.
AppointmentsDaoImpl
In this class we will have the Create, Read, Update and Delete files for the appointments table from the MySQL server.
AppointmentView
This class houses the needed things to initialize and load the Appointment View for the app.
Contacts
This is the Contact class for creating the Contact objects.
ContactsDaoImpl
In this class we will have the Create, Read, Update and Delete files for the contacts table from the MySQL server.
Countries
This is the Countries class for creating the Countries object.
CountriesDaoImpl
In this class we will have the Create, Read, Update and Delete files for the countries table from the MySQL server.
Customers
This is the Customers class for creating the Customer object.
CustomersDaoImpl
In this class we will have the Create, Read, Update and Delete files for the customers table from the MySQL server.
CustomerView
THis class controls the Customer View for the app.
DBConnection
This class houses the credentials and process to access the MySQL server.
FirstLevelDivisions
This handles the first level division object creation.
FirstLevelDivisionsDaoImpl
This class retrieves First Level Country data from the MySQL server.
LoginScreen
This is the controller for the initial login screen of the app.
Main
 
MenuView
This class is the controller for the Menu View page of the app.
Query
This class houses the query statement.
ReportPage
This class is the controller for the report page of the app.
UserDaoImpl
In this class we will have the Create, Read, Update and Delete files for the users table from the MySQL server.
